text: Alan Gilbert Merten (December 27, 1941 â€“ May 21, 2020) was an American educator. He was the fifth President of George Mason University from 1996 until his retirement in 2012. He was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Merten died on May 21, 2020 in Florida from Parkinson's disease-related problems, aged 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Educators from Milwaukee Category:Writers from Milwaukee
title: Alan Merten
